MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Muscle this, muscle that, shut the hell up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「謙吾、勝負だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, let's fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, let's fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さあ、どこにも逃がさないぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you can't run anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you can't run anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「たのもーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wanna leave it to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wanna leave it to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「手負いだろうが、手加減はしねぇぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're hurt, but I won't take it easy on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're hurt, but I won't take it easy on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこの最強、勝負だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you Superman! Let's fight!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you Superman! Let's fight!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこの最強、待ちな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you Superman, hold it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you Superman, hold it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「悪いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「はりゃほれうまうーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Harya hore umau.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Harya hore umau.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「ひとりずつ料理してやるぜ、うまうー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝I'll throw you in the pot, one by one, umau.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝I'll throw you in the pot, one by one, umau.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「次はおまえの番だ、うまうー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝You're up next, umau.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝You're up next, umau.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「消えろ、うまうー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Get lost, umau.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Get lost, umau.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃんと戦うことになるとは…皮肉だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So I'm fighting Komari-chan now... What irony...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So I'm fighting Komari-chan now... What irony...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんか恐いな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's kinda freaky...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's kinda freaky...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹とやるのか…仕方ない、いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fighting with Riki... I guess it can't be helped... Let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fighting with Riki... I guess it can't be helped... Let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「馬鹿が、返り討ちだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You idiot... You brought this on yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You idiot... You brought this on yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「地獄に突き落としてやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll send you to the underworld...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll send you to the underworld...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「跡形もなく消し去ってやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll erase every trace of you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll erase every trace of you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「星くずと変えてやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll turn you into space dust...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll turn you into space dust...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「くっく、後悔させてやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kukku... I'll make you regret this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kukku... I'll make you regret this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえに明日などない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝For you, there will be no tomorrow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝For you, there will be no tomorrow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おや、これはとんだ身の程知らずだ…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh my, looks like someone doesn't know his place...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Just like a moth flying into the flame...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Freaky, that guy's freaky! But I have to do this... but that's freaky!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Freaky, that guy's freaky! But I have to do this... but that's freaky!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Very well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Very well.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll be your opponent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll be your opponent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「後でいっしょにどーなつ食べよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝After this, let's go have some donuts～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝After this, let's go have some donuts～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「後でいっしょにチョコケーキ食べよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝After this, let's go have some chocolate～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝After this, let's go have some chocolate～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「『whistle to one's dog』、口笛で犬を呼ぶって意味だよー。私は吹けないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝They say it's faster to whistle to one's dog. I can't whistle though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝They say it's faster to whistle to one's dog. I can't whistle though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「意味がよくわからないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't really understand...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't really understand...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ、こわいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaa, scary!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaa, scary!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うぇえーんっ、なんかきたよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uee～! Something's coming!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uee～! Something's coming!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふええっ、ど、どうしようっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuee, wha... what should I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuee, wha... what should I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ!!　や、やるの～？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaa!! Y... you wanna fight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaa!! Y... you wanna fight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん…やれるだけがんばってみるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ok... I'll do what I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ok... I'll do what I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「お手柔らかにね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Be gentle please～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Be gentle please～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それよりお茶会はどうですか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Instead of that, how about having tea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Instead of that, how about having tea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わっふる食べたいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I wanna eat a waffle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I wanna eat a waffle...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「たいやきもおいしいよねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Taiyaki is also tasty, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Taiyaki is also tasty, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「和三盆のコンペイトウも最高だよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Wasanbon candy is the best, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Wasanbon candy is the best, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「るんのるんのる～ん♪」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Lun no lun no luuu～n♪❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Lun no lun no luuu～n♪❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はぁ…ねこになりたいなぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Haaa... I wanna be a cat～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haaa... I wanna be a cat～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「Make it as mild as it can be please...（できるだけマイルドにしてください…）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Make it as mild as it can be please...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Make it as mild as it can be please...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, you can jump to Onee-san's bosom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, you can jump to Onee-san's bosom.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I know no mercy.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll punish you by beating you at your own game.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll punish you by beating you at your own game.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おねーさんのマリオネットの刑に処す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll punish you by turning you into Onee-san's marionette.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「実はドＳなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Are you really an ❛S❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you really an ❛S❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ…意外とノってやってないかキミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What... I thought you'd be more into it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What... I thought you'd be more into it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年、キミもやっちゃうがいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, is it ok to take you down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, is it ok to take you down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おねーさんがお仕置きしてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will hand out your punishment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will hand out your punishment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、おねーさんの胸に飛び込んでくるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, you can jump to Onee-san's bosom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, you can jump to Onee-san's bosom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「楽しいオシオキターイムにしてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll make it a pleasurable punishment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll make it a pleasurable punishment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうでもいいが筋肉が付きすぎても美しくないぞ。ロシア系レスラーになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't really care, but it isn't elegant at all to overuse your muscles. You'll just become a Russian wrestler.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't really care, but it isn't elegant at all to overuse your muscles. You'll just become a Russian wrestler.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「残念だが今の私は虫の居所が悪い。泣いて喚いて哀願する目に遭うだろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's unfortunate, but I'm in a bad mood. You'll surely end up crying and begging for mercy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's unfortunate, but I'm in a bad mood. You'll surely end up crying and begging for mercy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「面白い。全力でいかせてもらおう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This will be interesting. Hit me with everything you got.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This will be interesting. Hit me with everything you got.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、やってみるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, give it a shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, give it a shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よかろう。断罪してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Perfect. You will now face your punishment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Perfect. You will now face your punishment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今のキミの姿に疑問はないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you think there's something off about the way you look now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you think there's something off about the way you look now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「面白い。全力でいかせてもらおう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This will be interesting. Hit me with everything you got.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This will be interesting. Hit me with everything you got.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、やってみるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, give it a shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, give it a shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よかろう。断罪してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Perfect. You will now face your punishment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Perfect. You will now face your punishment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「手緩いぞ恭介氏。面白い勝負になればいいんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're too lenient, Mr. Kyousuke. It would have been nice to have an interesting fight...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're too lenient, Mr. Kyousuke. It would have been nice to have an interesting fight...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ようこそ挑戦者」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Here comes a new challenger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Here comes a new challenger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…まあ黙っておくが」

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@$S024「『ヒゲ』が『耳毛』とか『なんとか毛』みたいに『ヒ』の毛かと考えてたところ耳鼻科とかで『ビ』が鼻を表す事に思い至りつまり『ビ毛』なのか！　と思ったらよく考えたらそれじゃ鼻毛と被っちゃうから全然違うと無駄な思考に気付いたはるちんに敵はないっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@$S016❝So I was thinking, ❛Does ❞cellophone❝ stand for a ❝cello❞ that's also a ❝phone,❞ or a ❝cell❛o❜phone,❞ that is, the cell of a phone...?❜ But then I realized it: a cell IS a phone!!! So when I further considered that, it suddenly dawned on me that you actually write it as ❛celloPHANE❜ and this was an entirely useless line of reasoning. And the Haruchin who realized this has no enemies her equal!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@$S016❝So I was thinking, ❛Does ❞cellophone❝ stand for a ❝cello❞ that's also a ❝phone,❞ or a ❝cell❛o❜phone,❞ that is, the cell of a phone...?❜ But then I realized it: a cell IS a phone!!! So when I further considered that, it suddenly dawned on me that you actually write it as ❛celloPHANE❜ and this was an entirely useless line of reasoning. And the Haruchin who realized this has no enemies her equal!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I submit to the challenge... ❛Submit,❜ that has quite a nice ring to it.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'll blow you away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「負けません。おじいさんの名にかけて」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I won't lose. I'll wager my grandfather's name on it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、鈴、やるってかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the problem, Rin, looking for a fight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the problem, Rin, looking for a fight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よりによって、おまえかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Out of all people, it had to be you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Out of all people, it had to be you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえとは戦いたくなかったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I didn't want to fight you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I didn't want to fight you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんてこった、理樹、おまえが立ちはだかるとはな」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Goodness, why did you have to get in my way, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹…ほんとにやるのか…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki... do you really want to do this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ばーかばーか、勝てるもんなら勝ってみろっ、べろべろばー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Stupid head, stupid head, if you think you can win, just try it! Huf huf huf!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Stupid head, stupid head, if you think you can win, just try it! Huf huf huf!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、リベンジかい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the problem? You wanna have another go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the problem? You wanna have another go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの生きる時代に生まれてきたことを後悔させてやるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll make you regret that you were born in my lifetime.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll make you regret that you were born in my lifetime.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいとも。こいよ。やってみろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Very well. Come on. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Very well. Come on. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よりによって、おまえかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Out of all people, it had to be you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Out of all people, it had to be you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだか未知数すぎて、不気味だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝There's too many of you... That's creepy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝There's too many of you... That's creepy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「きたか…オレは強いぜ？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So you've come... knowing my strength?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それ以上言うな、筋肉でわかる」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't say any more. My muscle understands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「筋肉コースでよかったかい」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did the Muscle Combo Set help you out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「筋肉フライト、一緒にするかい」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You wanna go on a Muscle Course with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「筋肉ランド夢の国へご招待だぜ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll invite you to Muscleland Paradise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いらっしゃいませ～、こちら筋肉バーとなっておりま～す」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Welcome to the Muscle Bar! Can I have your order?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you sure? For times like these, my muscles are always warmed up and ready to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you sure? For times like these, my muscles are always warmed up and ready to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほぅ…意外と筋肉グルメだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hoo... Quite the Muscle Gourmet, aren't you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hoo... Quite the Muscle Gourmet, aren't you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よし、いこうぜ。そこまで筋肉ウェーブがやってきてる。今年一番のビッグウェーブだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, let's go. A Muscle Wave is coming. It's the biggest of the season, and you gotta ride the wave!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, let's go. A Muscle Wave is coming. It's the biggest of the season, and you gotta ride the wave!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're saying that with that muscle? That's pathetic!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is it time to begin the Muscle Festival? OK with me!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just by looking at our muscles, the match is already decided, are you sure you want to do it?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No matter how much we go at it, you'll never win...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You, of all people... It seems that you need a traumatic experience before you understand.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Didn't I say it'd be impossible, oh you muscleless one!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's all about muscles these days.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝There is no girl who won't fall for my Muscle Talk. Hands down.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What is that wedged in between your skin and bones? That ain't Muscle...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't you see? You're already trapped in my Muscle Dimension.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The tree with muscle. That's me.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is it possible that you... don't understand Muscle!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You keep saying muscle like it's nothing, you got any idea what it means to me? Next time, think before you say muscle aloud, fool!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hah, even Newton discovered the power of muscle.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The soba kneaded with these hands can certainly be called ❛Muscle Soba.❜ But what does that really mean?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The pizza tossed with these hands can certainly be called ❛Muscle Pizza.❜ But what does that really mean?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Haha! What a story. Even my Muscle is laughing!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't stand in my way... Rin.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Rin... So the day has come when I'm to fight you...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but I will give no quarter.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝As you are now, what can you do?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't stand in my way... Kamikita.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmm... I'm not sweet like your candy.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph... This won't be as easy as the mathematical equations you like to solve.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝LITTLE BUSTERS SHIE――――LD!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't stand in my way... Noumi.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmm... I'm not obedient like your dogs there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmm... I'm not obedient like your dogs there.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't stand in my way... Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph... I'm not doing this for fun, unlike you and your little pranks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺の前に立ちはだかるな…西園」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't stand in my way... Nishizono.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't stand in my way... Nishizono.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっ…おまえの読むミステリーのようには綺麗に片づけられないぞ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph... This isn't going to get wrapped up all nice and neat like those mystery novels you read.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹…おまえと戦う日が来るとはな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki... So the day has come when I'm to fight you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki... So the day has come when I'm to fight you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「悪いが手加減はなしだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but I will give no quarter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but I will give no quarter.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝As you are now, what can you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝As you are now, what can you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「のぞむところだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is what I've been hoping for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is what I've been hoping for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「返り討ちにしてくれよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll turn the tables on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll turn the tables on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「無様に這いつくばるがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you want to grovel unsightfully, be my guest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you want to grovel unsightfully, be my guest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Very well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Very well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえと戦う日が来るなんてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The day has come when I'm to fight you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The day has come when I'm to fight you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「よし、受けてたとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝OK, let's get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝OK, let's get started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんなにこのジャンパーが欲しいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You want this jumper that badly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You want this jumper that badly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いいだろう。受けて立とう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Very well. I take your challenge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Very well. I take your challenge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふ…連戦連勝の男だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm... This man has an unbroken string of victories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm... This man has an unbroken string of victories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いいだろう。受けて立とう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Very well. I take your challenge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Very well. I take your challenge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほぅ…本気だな」
